title: Pf2e Camping
description: A module for camping activities in non-Kingmaker games.

camping.label: Camping
camping.description: An activity that can be performed by a character during a camping session. A camping activity usually takes 2 hours to complete.

ingredient.label: Ingredient
ingredient.description: An ingredient used for cooking meals, some ingredients are special which have their own specific meals that can be cooked with those specific ingredients for different effects.

meal.label: Meal
meal.description: A meal meant to be eaten immediatley after it is cooked. It won't last very long, but will provide a benefit to those that consume it better than normal Rations would provide.
